intro: Ideleria capensis, commonly known as the Cape ideleria, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly known as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its succulent leaves and small, star-shaped flowers that bloom in shades of yellow and orange. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, often found in rocky soils and along coastal areas. Due to its ornamental value and adaptability, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens in regions with a Mediterranean climate.
